sentences.en: An overpass is being put up at the corner of the street.
sentences.cn: 在那条街的拐角处正在建起一个过街天桥。

sentences.en: Go down this street until you come to an overpass.
sentences.cn: 沿着这条街走下去,直到你看到一座天桥.

sentences.en: I crossed over the pedestrian overpass.
I walked through an overpass over the road.
sentences.cn: 我步行穿过那条公路上面的立交桥.

sentences.en: Otherwise, why would nobody fall in love with a homeless person who lives under an overpass?
sentences.cn: 她继续说道，“不然的话，为何没人会同一个无家可归、生活在天桥下的人相爱呢？”

sentences.en: Please use the overpass to cross the street.
Take the zebra crossing, pedestrian overpass or underpass to cross the road.
sentences.cn: 过马路要走斑马线 、 人行天桥或地下通道!

sentences.en: The accident location for the liberation of artesian District Binjiang Road overpass.
sentences.cn: 事故发生地点为自流井区滨江路解放立交桥.

sentences.en: The city built a pedestrian overpass over the highway.
sentences.cn: 城里在公路上建了一座过街天桥.

sentences.en: The force of the crash was so strong that the roof of one car flew into the air and landed on an overpass above the tracks.
sentences.cn: 撞击的力量如此之大，以至于一节车厢的车顶腾空飞起，落在轨道上方的一个天桥上。

sentences.en: The traffic on this street's too heavy. Let's use the overpass.
sentences.cn: 这条马路车太多,让我们走天桥.

sentences.en: There is an overpass of 100 lbs.
sentences.cn: 重量超越了100磅,百度优化.

sentences.en: They built an overpass that overbuilt another one.
sentences.cn: 他们在一座立交桥的上方又建了一座立体交叉桥.

sentences.en: Two cargo trains slammed together at a rail intersection southwest of Cape Girardeau, derailing cars that then struck the support columns of a highway overpass.
sentences.cn: 两辆货运火车在开普吉拉多西南部的铁路交叉口发生碰撞，部分车厢脱轨，并撞毁了高速公路天桥的支撑柱。

sentences.en: We should take the overpass when crossing the road.
Yell English on an overpass right now!
sentences.cn: 现在就到人行天桥上大声练英语!

sentences.en: Yell Happy English on an overpass right now!
sentences.cn: 第十,现在就到人行天桥上大声练开心英语!

trans.tran_en: a structure like a bridge that allows one road to go over another road

trans.tran_cn: 超过，穿过，渡过，通过，越过，忽视，过去，结束
